About the Artist

My name is Arielle Pivonka and I make art. My bold acrylic paintings meet reflective themes like war, religion, and southern life. Known for my blend of humor and seriousness, I create original pieces and prints that resonate with art lovers looking for something meaningful and unique.

Visit Fatale Allure Gallery in person at varying markets around the DFW area to discover my latest works, and keep up to date with current gallery events, entries from my personal life, and more on my newsletter using Substack!
